status: Food was okay..but I must say the staff they have Uttara is da most rude,arrogant and ill mannered..funny part is they sell bottled water but they won't serve a glass to drink the water..when asked the man at the counter Mr Ruhul Amin instantly started yelling at us saying that this their owner's business idea of not having glasses for drinking water..the waiter was interrupted by other customers who agreed wid me..at one point the waiter became furious and threatened me of physical assault..I was astounded by his behaviour and thot it wud b wise to avoid further debate..instead of taking my feedback of providing water glasses positively the man constantly kept on saying that Takeout business is going very well and they do not require any customer feedback..

This is what the so-called awesome Takeout is about. You order bbq chicken burger with cheese and fries through Foodpanda and magically get a beef delight cheese burger only! Disgusting service.Now i have to starve. And also I hate what they serve as bacon. Bacon  is a type of salt-cured pork. If you are serving beef named as bacon with chicken burger, please type it in big font, not under the item like mobile companies “*condition applied”

have travelled around there world, even have experienced some very renowned burger chains but definitely takeout is the only one to fascinate my taste buds.. take out is really one of the best things that has happened to me..

Spice it up please. I ordered the Extra Spicy Beef Cheese Delight the other day, I could feel all the produce there except the spice. Me and my sister both had the same idea that the burgers were not spicy at all, This is what setting Chillox in a bit more advanced position in the market. Hopefully Takeout can resolve this. It breaks my heart to rate only 2 stars.

Bad quality food. Day by day Takeout food and service quality is decreasing and other competitors is increasing their food and service both. Now it is a bad place for burger lover. I would not recommend this restaurant. Their food price is very high.

Fake business people. Can't come up with your own food ideas? You think people are going to go and have your fake food? Have you ever heard of true and loyal customers? No definitely. Because you don't have them. You don't know how to earn them. The loyal ones are not going to go and gulp your nokol food. My huge condolences of curses and swears for you. You guys are the biggest brand ambassador of LOSERS. God bless your poor souls. Takeout 2.O is original.

One of the worst restaurant in the city. First of all we need to wait for chairs than when we ordered 3 burgers and it took 40 minutes to come to our hand. Taste is not good. Maybe food was frozen. Beef burger was cold. We don't recommend this restaurant. So be aware and think twice before going to this restaurant.

One of the worst restaurant in the city. First of all we need to wait for chairs than when we ordered 3 burgers and it took 40 minutes to come to our hand. Taste is not good. Maybe food was frozen. Beef burger was cold. We don't recommend this restaurant. So be aware and think twice before going to this restaurant.

Stealing others brand to get success, shows how poor your mentality is. I would have tried your restaurant if you were honest, but now I will never go there and suggest people to not go there. Losers....you will always remain in the bottom. Takeout 2.O is original.
I ordered chicken burger with bbq sauce. But they didn't provide any sauce and the bun was may be two days old.

Was a fan of takeout. After the banani outlet closed, I decided to try out the Dhanmondi outlet with my family. Unfortunately, i was very disappointed when I tasted the burgers. It was cold and the quality of food was not the same at all. Did not expect this. Service was very poor as well. After all this, I can definitely say that I'm never going there again. It was a mistake to take my family. Was excited cause I always wanted to take them to takeout.

Average burgers at not so average price. I was heavily recommend to eat burgers here so had quite high expectations. Unfortunately I was totally let down. I ordered the largest burger and while it seemed to be full of ingredients, it simply did not taste that good. Don't get me wrong, the burger was definitely not bad but it was below average and at this price, you can eat better and juicier burgers elsewhere.
compared to the first time, oshomvvob baje service hoye geche apnader... Food's quality is degrading way too fast. Shame guys. Use to love your burgers.

For the last 3years I'm a Takeout Burger fan, I can say Takeout's burger is just unbeatable .But why I did give 4stars? because of the ambience I found at new branch at KB Square, I found the environment too noisy, like the music volume was too damn loud, because of loud music people were shouting and talking like no body isnt listening em....and I found it too disturbing, I wanted to take parcel instead of eating burgers there, but I couldnt because my brother was with me there, anyways, suggestion is, music should be in 20% volume, and playlist shouldn't contain party song tracks, pump up the bass but decrease the treble bar on speaker system, hope soon you guys will value my review, Thanks!

I used to be a huge fan of your burgers. I went with my friends today and experienced the worst service. The Air Condition was not working properly and we were literally sweating. After ordering 6 burgers and french fries, while eating we asked for some extra cheese for the fries and the waiter said he can't provide it for the policy. That's totally fine but dude atleast show some manners, you don't need to act rude to say no. We complained about the air condition and the waiter didn't give a damn.

awesome place. Burgers are very tasty & delicious. Though the sitting arrangements have some issue but its ok. But you should give more attention to your cleanliness in sitting area...have a staff to mop the floor.in regular intervals.

I am a huge burger lover. Being American, I supposedly have the best options. Shake Shack makes awesome burgers. But TakeOut has WOWed me. The Beef Bacon is a bit huge, definitely filling, tastes quite delicious, and is one of the best burgers I have ever had. Extremely Delicious!!!!!!! Try it.....with reasonable price

I heard from maybe a 100 people that the burgers of TakeOut were awesome. Finally had the courage to order one through Foodpanda. Ordered the Beef and Bacon burger (super spicy) with one additional patty. I was skeptical about the reviews because I have literally tasted every good burger in Dhaka. When the food arrived, I was satisfied seeing the size of the box. I was mildly surprised when the box unraveled into a plate (much like the ones that come with Chinese takeout items). The size of the patty that was on the burger exceeded expectations and the spice content made me break out in tears. I was overjoyed that I was having such a delicious burger and at the same time I was crying because of the mix of spice and flavors playing in my mouth. It was an awesome burger and I would definitely order it again. Just one suggestion, even though the patty was meaty and awesome, a little more juicy textures on the inside of the patty would be great.
Increase the amount of french fries

Hands down the best place to eat... There are pure awesomeness in every bite you take which is enough to make your day... You might regret after eating from there because you won't be able stop yourself from getting those delicious bacon burgers over and over again .. Anyway God bless your food

Takeout's burger had set the milestone in my burger world. I used to be a Madchef fan, comparing all other burgers to the standard of Madchef, but now Takeout is my 10/10, and other burgers must be rated accordingly.

As I was enjoying a Special Beef Burger inside your Banani outlet today I was telling my friend how I've tried a lot of burgers from every corner of the world (27 countries to be exact). And Takeout is definitely amongst my top 10. Always fresh ingredients. No skimping on the meat. Great job guys.
